name: Update emails from a Google Sheet with email status using Loqate
description: Every time a new row is added to a Google Sheet, Make will automatically validate the emails by Loqate and update the Google Sheet with the status of the emails. The example uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/12HW43OxTRvxYVZUovMDXEBYQHdVkQf2vtbXlwuAZQrQ/edit?usp=sharing).
